author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...DEPRESSION STRENGTHENS INTO TROPICAL STORM FLOSSIE... ...TROPICAL STORM WATCH EXTENDED NORTHWARD IN MEXICO...
summary: ...DEPRESSION STRENGTHENS INTO TROPICAL STORM FLOSSIE... ...TROPICAL STORM WATCH EXTENDED NORTHWARD IN MEXICO... As of 9:00 AM CST Sun Jun 29 the center of Flossie was located near 13.4, -99.9 with movement W at 9 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1005 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...DEPRESSION STRENGTHENS INTO TROPICAL STORM FLOSSIE... ...TROPICAL STORM WATCH EXTENDED NORTHWARD IN MEXICO... As of 9:00 AM CST Sun Jun 29 the center of Flossie was located near 13.4, -99.9 with movement W at 9 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1005 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.

title: Summary for Tropical Storm Flossie (EP1/EP062025)
